title: (x) World Trade Center movie logo - Penumbra {Mike}
content:
Can anyone ID this font for me? Thanks in advance.

Source: [http://www.wtcmovie.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070225173826/http:/www.wtcmovie.com/)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [WTC.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070225173826/http:/typophile.com/files/WTC.jpg) | 50.72 KB |
author: sirmon

comments.content:
That’s Penumbra.

Check out:

[http://www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/da\_vinci\_code\_font\_penumbra.cfm](http://web.archive.org/web/20070225173826/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/da_vinci_code_font_penumbra.cfm)

Enjoy,

Mikey
This must be about the most courteous forum in the known universe. :^)

I’m telling you guys, people won’t make smallcaps look  
right even if Tschichold was standing next to them with  
German lobotomy equipment, but nooooo… “I’ll just keep  
including SC for free in my fonts.” Jeeezus.

hhp
Curiously the same font used in The Da Vinci Code. Could this be the new Trajan???

I was thinking the same thing! :-)  
It’s like Trajan and Futura had a kid, isn’t it.  
Strangely, I like it so much more than either.

hhp

\>\> _Curiously the same font used in The Da Vinci Code. Could this be the new Trajan???_

\> _I was thinking the same thing!_ :-)

Me too! :^D

BTW… What ever happened to the Adobe MM fonts? I was just a kid when they first came out and of course I could not use my 386 for graphics and macs were thousands of dollars.

Mikey
